Load the CLC (i.e. 100LC because R package names cannot start with numers) R library (TODO: work in progress).

```{r}
library(clc)
library(readr)
```

Get a list of file IDs from the 100LC data.

```{r}
file_ids <- clc::get_file_ids()
```

Loop through the file IDs, generate word frequency counts per file, write the output to disk.

```{r}
df <- clc::get_word_counts(file_ids[1])

```
